surface_integrity.skin_shader_logic: High-fidelity subsurface scattering (SSS) simulation with micro-pore texture retention. Capable of rendering realistic 'glow' and sweat-layer translucency.
surface_integrity.textural_balance: Harmonious blending of photorealistic sharpness with soft artistic gradients. Avoids overly clinical digital noise.

anatomical_poetics.weight_distribution: Naturalistic gravity simulation in limbs and torso. Respects the 'S-curve' (contrapposto) in standing postures.
anatomical_poetics.organic_flow: Continuous topological smoothness in joints (elbows, knees) during complex positioning.

metabolic_status: Internalized. Source binary purged to maintain system lightness.
